channel.title: LCallDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from LCallDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 'Dear God': Democrats storm out of vote on controversial Trump nominee
item.description: Democrats left the room before the panel voted to confirm the judicial nomination of Trump's former personal attorney, Emil Bove.

item.title: CNN Poll: 63 Percent Fancy a Third Party; 74 Percent Don't Like Musk's
item.description: As popular as the idea of a centrist third party might be among Americans, the one Elon Musk is launching as the America Party is even more unpopular.
